src:
Märkeshändelse: Äntligen rusar sargade investmentaktien
Investmentbolaget Ratos ökade vinsten kraftigt under tredje kvartalet. Rapporten gjorde Ratos till en sällsynt börsvinnare, och möjligen har aktien lämnat de absolut bottennivåerna för gott. 
05 Nov 2019, 14:20 by Ulf Petersson

text:
Brand event: Finally, the sordid investment share is rushing
Investment company Ratos increased its profits sharply during the third quarter. The report made Ratos a rare stock winner, and possibly the stock has left the absolute bottom levels for good.
05 Nov 2019, 14:20 by Ulf Petersson
